However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7660850/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jeroen-106","dateCreated":"2018-06-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"I don't understand the negativity.","reviewBody":"Characters are actually not one-dimensional as some people state here. Everyone is imperfect in this show. And even if they all seem greedy, they all have their weaknesses and their motivation is rooted deep in their personalities. For example the son who is temp CEO only wants his father's approval and pride, but gets rejected time after time. He plays the character very well. It's a healthy dose of drama and humor. I'm not sure yet about The Office - ish camerawork (sudden zooms) because it gives the impression of a mockumentary, as if the cameraman is there and just recording what is happening in real-time. It clashes a bit with the overall style of the show. Same for some of The Office style humor they brought to this show. But these are minor things that don't get in the way of the story.\n\nDefinitely recommended. Give it a few episodes!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":65778,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-06-03","keywords":"media empire,patriarchy,wealth,dysfunctional family,business","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007814/","name":"Hiam Abbass","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1002609/","name":"Nicholas Braun","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004051/","name":"Brian Cox"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186190/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0702468/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0770923/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1104036/","name":"Jesse Armstrong"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3233792793","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season two, Logan Roy begins Season three in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances. Tensions rise as a bitter corporate battle threatens to turn into a family civil war."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: La soubrette était timide
programme.desc: Une employée de maison platureuse séduit tous ceux qui l'approchent. Ingénue et ignorant son pouvoir, elle doit d'abord apprendre à surmonter sa timidité..

programme.title: 120 battements par minute
programme.desc: Au début des années 1990, Nathan participe pour la première fois à une assemblée de l'association Act Up Paris, qui milite pour les droits des séropositifs. Dès le premier soir, il se porte volontaire avec d'autres adhérents pour mener une action spectaculaire contre un laboratoire pharmaceutique. Nathan assiste ensuite à de nombreuses réunions où les échanges sont souvent musclés. Là, il rencontre Sean, à l'engagement et au discours particulièrement virulents. Après avoir distribué des tracts dans un lycée, ils tombent amoureux. Mais Sean est atteint du sida.

programme.title: Deux jours à tuer
programme.desc: Drame.

programme.title: Ecailles de Rose
programme.desc: Rose est persuadée d'être une sirène mais la réalité en a décidé autrement. Au bord du lac Léman elle fête ses dix-huit ans, et aux côtés de Sébastien, ses rêves semblent devenir réalité.

programme.title: La princesse de Montpensier
programme.desc: En 1562, le roi Charles IX gouverne la France et les guerres de religion font rage. Marie de Mézières, amoureuse d'Henri, duc de Guise, est contrainte par son père d'épouser le prince de Montpensier. Son mari, appelé par le roi à rejoindre la guerre contre les protestants, la laisse en compagnie de son précepteur, le comte de Chabannes, loin du monde, au château de Champigny. La jeune femme, qui ne parvient pas à oublier le duc de Guise, devient malgré elle l’enjeu de passions auxquelles vient se mêler un autre soupirant, le duc d’Anjou, futur Henri III.

programme.title: L'échange des princesses
programme.desc: A Versailles, en 1712, le duc d'Anjou, jalousement veillé par madame de Ventadour, devient le nouvel héritier du trône après la mort du duc de Bretagne. En 1722, Louis XV, âgé de 11 ans, est de retour à Versailles, abandonné sept ans plus tôt. Philippe d'Orléans, régent soucieux d'assurer la paix du royaume, souhaite marier Louis XV avec l'infante d'Espagne, Maria Anna Victoria, âgée de 4 ans. Si l'adolescent accepte, Louise-Elisabeth, la fille de Philippe d'Orléans, se refuse, elle, à épouser le prince des Asturies.

programme.title: Les cobayes
programme.desc: Le laboratoire pharmaceutique Biothema vient de mettre au point un traitement, intitulé Ocy 36, qui influe sur les sentiments de ses sujets. Après plusieurs phases d'essais concluants, la laboratoire fait appel à des cobayes humains pour la dernière phase de tests. Adam, chercheur en sciences sociales, et Charlotte, cadre dans une grande entreprise, en couple depuis le lycée et parents d'un petit Basile, se portent volontaires, en espérant que ce traitement sauvera leur couple. Tous deux commencent le traitement, mais celui-ci ne montre pas de résultats immédiats.

programme.title: Rencontre à Hampstead Park
programme.desc: Emily Walters, une américaine, tient une petite boutique de vêtements à Hampstead Heath, un quartier bourgeois de Londres. Malgré les tentatives répétées de ses amies de lui trouver un nouveaux compagnon, la sexagénaire vit toujours seule depuis la mort de son mari Charles, un personnage infidèle qui la laissée endettée. Dans le même quartier, Donald Horner mène une existence bien différente, dans une petite cabane, vivant d'expédients. Mais celle-ci est menacée par l'arrivée d'un promoteur immobilier désireux de construire dans le quartier.

programme.title: The White Lotus
The White Lotus

The vacationers include the Mossbacher family - Nicole (Connie Britton), a successful type-A exec, who can't help but treat her family like disobedient employees; her husband, Mark (Steve Zahn), dealing with both an embarrassing health crisis and a terminal inferiority complex; their teenaged son, Quinn (Fred Hechinger), a socially awkward gamer, experiencing the wonder of nature for the very first time; their daughter, Olivia (Sydney Sweeney), and her friend, Paula (Brittany O'Grady), sharp-tongued college sophomores who cast a sardonic eye on the lifestyles and belief systems of everyone around them. The handsome, entitled Shane Patton (Jake Lacy) is here with his beautiful bride, Rachel (Alexandra Daddario). Shane and Rachel are in the throes of young love, but as they get to know each other better in this new, intimate environment, clouds of doubt appear - and by the time Shane's intrusive mother, Kitty (Molly Shannon) surprises them with an unwelcome visit, their fairytale honeymoon has begun to unravel. And finally, there is Tanya McQuoid (Jennifer Coolidge), a wealthy, unstable woman, recovering from the death of her mother, traveling alone to the hotel, looking for love and in desperate need of a massage."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Après la vive réaction de Jimmy contre le père d'Antigone, Elizabeth décide de le faire transférer en HP.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: La tentative de suicide de Jimmy a des effets dans tout le service. Les infirmiers décident de se mettre en grève.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila a désobéi et mis en place, en secret, un autre protocole thérapeutique pour Gudz. Le patient réagit mal au traitement, il est en danger de mort imminente. Sheila appelle Jimmy à la rescousse. Elle va devoir avouer à Elizabeth qu'elle n'a pas choqué son patient. Pour lui changer les idées, Baya l'entraine dans une très confidentielle soirée "d'astreinte", dans les caves de l'hôpital..

programme.title: Nicky Larson Private Eyes
programme.desc: Au cours d'une de ses missions en plein coeur du quartier animé de Shinjuku, à Tokyo, Nicky Larson est pris dans une fusillade qui sème destruction et confusion aux alentours. Au même moment, Frank Carter, le père d'Iris Woods meurt dans un étrange accident de voiture. La jeune femme, qui se sent depuis menacée, fait appel à l'agence de Nicky et Laura pour assurer sa sécurité. La jeune femme, célèbre top model, emmène les deux détectives à l'une de ses séances de photo. C'est là qu'il croisent le chemin de Christopher King, patron de la florissante société Dominatech. Mais King est également un ancien camarade de collège de Laura.

programme.title: Obama
programme.desc: Les deux mandats successifs de Barack Obama à la Maison Blanche sont émaillés de faits marquants comme le meurtre de Trayvon Martin ou la tuerie survenue dans une église à Charleston. Donald Trump a su capter les insatisfactions de la politique intérieure.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Dans le quartier de Harlem, à New York, en 1970, à la mort du caïd local dont il était le chauffeur et confident depuis quinze ans, Frank Lucas décide de prendre la relève. Jeune, ambitieux et intelligent, il ne veut dépendre de personne et met son propre réseau sur pied. Utilisant les avions de l'armée américaine, il importe des quantités massives d'héroïne et amasse rapidement une fortune colossale.

programme.title: Sécurité rapprochée
programme.desc: Thriller.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: Thriller.

programme.title: Balnéothérapie
programme.desc: Jonas et Cléo sont partis observer les baleines. Pourtant, lorsque le jeune couple arrive a¶ destination, la station balnéaire est complétement déserte et particulièrement inquiétante. Face a¶ cet environnement hostile, Cléo espère que Jonas saura la protéger du danger.

programme.title: La vallée blanche
programme.desc: En plein cœur de l'hiver, Lucie découvre un village où tout le monde s'est endormi. Fascinée par Noémie, une jeune femme assoupie, Lucie s'installe chez elle.

programme.title: Les Croods
programme.desc: Les Crood, famille de Néandertal, vit selon des règles bien précises, dictées par le père, Grug, depuis des années. Pour éviter l'extinction, Grug interdit toute prise de risque à sa femme et à ses enfants. Mais Eep, adolescente, ne supporte plus ce mode de vie corseté. Tout change quand elle rencontre Guy, un jeune homme qui sait maîtriser le feu. Le lendemain, la destruction de leur caverne pousse les Crood a découvrir un monde qui leur était inconnu.

programme.title: Les Trolls
programme.desc: Pendant longtemps, les trolls, de petites créatures colorées, vivaient heureux dans les arbres de la forêt où ils passaient leur temps à chanter, danser et à se faire des câlins. Jusqu'au jour où ils ont été découverts par les bergen, des monstres sinistres et géants, qui ont découvert qu'ils pouvaient être heureux en mangeant des trolls. Vingt ans ont passé et les trolls vivent cachés dans la forêt, sous la houlette du roi Peppy et de sa fille, la joyeuse princesse Poppy. Parmi eux, Branche, beaucoup moins joyeux, car il vit dans la crainte permanente que les bergen ne trouvent leur cachette.

programme.title: La jeune fille et son aigle
programme.desc: En Mongolie, Aisholpan, une jeune fille kazakh âgée de treize ans, tente de s'imposer en tant que dresseuse d'aigles royaux, un métier réservé aux hommes. Avec l'aide de son père, elle décide d'adopter un aigle pour en faire un chasseur de renards.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Après la vive réaction de Jimmy contre le père d'Antigone, Elizabeth décide de le faire transférer en HP.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: La tentative de suicide de Jimmy a des effets dans tout le service. Les infirmiers décident de se mettre en grève.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Les grands-parents de Jimmy débarquent dans le service de l'HP sans savoir qu'il s'y trouve. Sheila entretient une relation ambigüe avec Baya.

programme.title: The Song of Names
programme.desc: Juste avant que la Seconde Guerre mondiale éclate, Dovidl Rapoport, un jeune virtuose polonais d'origine juive, est confié à une famille bourgeoise londonienne. D'abord jaloux, Martin, le fils unique des Simmonds, finit par se lier d'amitié avec lui. En 1951, juste avant un concert important, Dovidl, alors âgé de 21 ans, disparaît sans laisser de traces. Des décennies plus tard, Martin, devenu critique musical, est toujours à sa recherche. Un jour, il pense tenir une piste quand il voit un jeune violoniste tenir son archet de la même manière que Dovidl.

programme.title: Une femme douce
programme.desc: Dans un village reculé Russie, une femme, déboutée par l'administration pénitentiaire, se voit retourner un colis qu'elle avait destiné quelques temps plus tôt à son mari incarcéré, à l’autre bout du pays, pour un crime qu'il n'a pas commis. Inquiète et désemparée, elle décide d’aller le porter elle-même à son époux. Mais, entre la mauvaise foi des fonctionnaires et la corruption des policiers, son parcours est semé d’embûches et d’humiliations. Arrivé au pénitencier, elle demande alors à voir son mari, mais personne ne peut lui dire où il se trouve.

programme.title: Boule et Bill
programme.desc: En France, en 1976, Boule, 9 ans, et ses parents s'arrêtent au chenil lors d'une promenade dominicale et ils découvrent un cocker. Malgré l'opposition du père, le chiot, baptisé Bill, est rapidement adopté. Mais, bien qu'animé de bonnes intentions, il multiplie les catastrophes. Quand la famille doit déménager pour Paris, le père tente, sans succès, d'en profiter pour se débarrasser de lui. C'est le moment où la tortue Caroline intègre la famille. Elle tombe amoureuse de Bill.

programme.title: Nicostratos le pélican
programme.desc: Comédie.

programme.title: 120 battements par minute
programme.desc: Au début des années 1990, Nathan participe pour la première fois à une assemblée de l'association Act Up Paris, qui milite pour les droits des séropositifs. Dès le premier soir, il se porte volontaire avec d'autres adhérents pour mener une action spectaculaire contre un laboratoire pharmaceutique. Nathan assiste ensuite à de nombreuses réunions où les échanges sont souvent musclés. Là, il rencontre Sean, à l'engagement et au discours particulièrement virulents. Après avoir distribué des tracts dans un lycée, ils tombent amoureux. Mais Sean est atteint du sida.

programme.title: Un peu, beaucoup, aveuglément
programme.desc: Une jeune pianiste, passionnée par son art mais peu sûre d'elle, s'installe enfin seule dans un appartement. Mais, dès la première nuit, d'étranges bruits l'effraient et la poussent à revenir chez Evguénie, son protecteur et professeur de piano. Le lendemain, elle persiste et découvre que son voisin le plus proche, un inventeur solitaire, voulait lui faire quitter son appartement. Entre les deux démarre une guerre sonore. Pourtant, bientôt, ils apprennent à se connaître.

programme.title: Dans Paris
programme.desc: Paul, 30 ans, rompt avec Anna et retourne quelques jours chez son père pour passer ce cap difficile. Son frère Jonathan, jeune homme insouciant, encore étudiant, tente de le sortir de sa déprime. Au cours d'une seule journée ponctuée de diverses rencontres, la famille, y compris la mère qui avait quitté son mari depuis plusieurs années, va se ressouder pour aider Paul à oublier ses pensées suicidaires.

programme.title: Maigret
programme.sub-title: Maigret et la demoiselle de compagnie

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Zwischen 21 Uhr und 6 Uhr legt KiKA eine Sendepause ein.

programme.title: Femmes de loi
programme.sub-title: S2 E2 Un amour de jeunesse

programme.title: Les petits meurtres d'Agatha Christie
Les petits meurtres d'Agatha Christie
programme.desc: Les petits meurtres d'Agatha Christie: Created by Agatha Christie, Thierry Debroux, Sylvie Simon, Anne Giafferi, Murielle Magellan, Flore Kosinetz, Hélène Lombard, Eliane Montane, Gábor Rassov, Sophie Révil. With Blandine Bellavoir, Samuel Labarthe, Elodie Frenck, Dominique Thomas. Agatha Christie's masterful storytelling gets a soupçon of French flair in these attractive, witty mysteries. programme.title: Below the Surface
programme.desc: A Copenhague, au Danemark, une rame de métro est détournée par trois hommes armés portant des cagoules. Quinze passagers sont pris en otages. Philip Norgaard, le chef du groupe PET Terror, est chargé de l'affaire. Les assaillants réclament une rançon de 4 millions d'euros pour la libération des otages..

programme.title: Below the Surface
programme.desc: Naja Toft a été licenciée pour avoir interviewé un otage sans autorisation. Pourtant, les terroristes souhaitent la garder comme unique voie de communication avec l'extérieur. Une deuxième interview se prépare sur le blog de la journaliste. Mais Philip redoute que cet entretien ne cache en réalité la préparation d'une exécution en direct.

programme.title: Strike Back
Strike Back
Strike Back
programme.desc:
Strike Back: With Philip Winchester, Sullivan Stapleton, Michelle Lukes, Daniel MacPherson. Follows the actions of Section 20, a secretive unit of British military intelligence. A team of special operations personnel conduct several high risk missions across the globe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1492179/","name":"Strike Back","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgyNDk4ZTYtM2EzNC00MmU3LTg2MmQtYjdlMjA4ZmEwNzU5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzU5Njg5MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the actions of Section 20, a secretive unit of British military intelligence. A team of special operations personnel conduct several high risk missions across the globe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1492179/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"colind888"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":""Struck Down"","reviewBody":"Whoever did the casting for Series 6 should be immediately taken out with an RPG. What were you thinking?? Replacing the god-like Philip Winchester, Sullivan Stapleton, Richard Armitage, Robson Green, Rhona Mitra and Andrew Lincoln with 3 midgets and a barbie doll all with dodgy accents. And to make matters worse, 20 is now being run by a timid girl from the BBC with a crush on Lord Grantham. You could not have got it more wrong if you had picked actors from the phone book.

I was really looking forward to the new season but so far The Brave is looking more polished and believable TV at every level. Totally disappointed!!

10 out of 10 for Series 1-4, 8 out of 10 for Series 5 and 5 out of 10 for this sad imitation.

Addendum: SE6E7 - unbelievable plot, unbelievable acting, unbelievable script, unbelievable romance, unbelievable decision making - just pathetic!! Lowering my rating on Season 6 to 3 stars and that is purely for the anthem "short change hero" which is all this debacle has left. Time to move on - RIP!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":30473,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2010-05-05","keywords":"friendship,kidnapping,terrorism,revenge,obsession","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934618/","name":"Philip Winchester"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0822982/","name":"Sullivan Stapleton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1495675/","name":"Michelle Lukes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0208971/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042496/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050995/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi209365273","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcyOTg3MzY0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDA1NjgxMDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcyOTg3MzY0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDA1NjgxMDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a teaser for the Cinemax limited series "Strike Back: Origins"."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Late Shift
The Late Shift – Spätvorstellung
programme.desc:
The Late Shift: Directed by Betty Thomas. With Kathy Bates, John Michael Higgins, Daniel Roebuck, Bob Balaban. A dramatization of the rivalry between David Letterman and Jay Leno to over which of them would succeed Johnny Carson as the host of "The Tonight Show"." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0116835/","name":"The Late Shift","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOThkMDFkZmUtZTg4MS00ZDVjLTg2MDktNzU4Y2M3ZmU5ZDFlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A dramatization of the rivalry between David Letterman and Jay Leno to over which of them would succeed Johnny Carson as the host of "The Tonight Show".","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0116835/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vikingsrule78"},"dateCreated":"2002-10-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"A really good movie.","reviewBody":"Alright, so maybe the impersonations of Jay Leno and David Letterman are not spot on, but you still get a sense of who these people are and how they operate behind the screen. Bob Balaban and Treat Williams are excellant as Warren Littlefield and Micheal Ovitz.

The movie doesn't go for joke and punchline but it is still funny. Kathy Bates in particular is amazing as Leno's manager.

The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7660850/","name":"Succession","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDE0ODVlYjktNjJiMC00ODk4LWIwNTktMWRhZmZiOGFhYmUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7660850/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jeroen-106","dateCreated":"2018-06-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"I don't understand the negativity.","reviewBody":"Characters are actually not one-dimensional as some people state here. Everyone is imperfect in this show. And even if they all seem greedy, they all have their weaknesses and their motivation is rooted deep in their personalities. For example the son who is temp CEO only wants his father's approval and pride, but gets rejected time after time. He plays the character very well. It's a healthy dose of drama and humor. I'm not sure yet about The Office - ish camerawork (sudden zooms) because it gives the impression of a mockumentary, as if the cameraman is there and just recording what is happening in real-time. It clashes a bit with the overall style of the show. Same for some of The Office style humor they brought to this show. But these are minor things that don't get in the way of the story.\n\nDefinitely recommended. Give it a few episodes!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":65778,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-06-03","keywords":"media empire,patriarchy,wealth,dysfunctional family,business","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007814/","name":"Hiam Abbass","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1002609/","name":"Nicholas Braun","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004051/","name":"Brian Cox"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186190/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0702468/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0770923/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1104036/","name":"Jesse Armstrong"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3233792793","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season two, Logan Roy begins Season three in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances. The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7660850/","name":"Succession","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDE0ODVlYjktNjJiMC00ODk4LWIwNTktMWRhZmZiOGFhYmUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7660850/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jeroen-106","dateCreated":"2018-06-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"I don't understand the negativity.","reviewBody":"Characters are actually not one-dimensional as some people state here. Everyone is imperfect in this show. And even if they all seem greedy, they all have their weaknesses and their motivation is rooted deep in their personalities. For example the son who is temp CEO only wants his father's approval and pride, but gets rejected time after time. He plays the character very well. It's a healthy dose of drama and humor. I'm not sure yet about The Office - ish camerawork (sudden zooms) because it gives the impression of a mockumentary, as if the cameraman is there and just recording what is happening in real-time. It clashes a bit with the overall style of the show. Same for some of The Office style humor they brought to this show. But these are minor things that don't get in the way of the story.\n\nDefinitely recommended. Give it a few episodes!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":65778,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-06-03","keywords":"media empire,patriarchy,wealth,dysfunctional family,business","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007814/","name":"Hiam Abbass","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1002609/","name":"Nicholas Braun","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004051/","name":"Brian Cox"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186190/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0702468/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0770923/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1104036/","name":"Jesse Armstrong"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3233792793","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season two, Logan Roy begins Season three in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances. For example the son who is temp CEO only wants his father's approval and pride, but gets rejected time after time. He plays the character very well. It's a healthy dose of drama and humor. I'm not sure yet about The Office - ish camerawork (sudden zooms) because it gives the impression of a mockumentary, as if the cameraman is there and just recording what is happening in real-time. It clashes a bit with the overall style of the show. Same for some of The Office style humor they brought to this show. But these are minor things that don't get in the way of the story.\n\nDefinitely recommended. Give it a few episodes!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":65778,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-06-03","keywords":"media empire,patriarchy,wealth,dysfunctional family,business","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007814/","name":"Hiam Abbass","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1002609/","name":"Nicholas Braun","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004051/","name":"Brian Cox"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186190/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0702468/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0770923/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1104036/","name":"Jesse Armstrong"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3233792793","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season two, Logan Roy begins Season three in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 2077823, Title: Perry Mason, --- Description: Perry Mason: Created by Ron Fitzgerald, Rolin Jones. With Matthew Rhys, Juliet Rylance, Chris Chalk, Shea Whigham. In booming 1932 Los Angeles, a down-and-out defense attorney takes on the case of a lifetime." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2077823/","name":"Perry Mason","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDllMWRjNWMtM2U3Ny00YjAwLTlhNTgtOThjZTc2YmI2ZmRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODkzNTgxMDg@._V1_.jpg","description":"In booming 1932 Los Angeles, a down-and-out defense attorney takes on the case of a lifetime.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2077823/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ztigr","dateCreated":"2020-08-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not a 1 star, but not a 10 either","reviewBody":"This series was a weird mish mash of 21st century culture clashing with 1930's reality. Alternative lifestyles, racism, politics, corruption, religious zealots, chauvanism, and uncertain economics all interwoven into a crime of the century murder trial. It all ends up sort of like Chinatown, with Perry Mason instead of the PI Jake utterly confused by what has just transpired. And that was my real question, is why Perry Mason. Why take something that most are familiar with and turn it upside down? There comes a point where your just using the name Perry Mason, and not much else. Its like taking Superman, taking away all his super powers, his cape, and making him a cop on the beat, but still calling him Superman. It doesn't make much sense. So its watchable at a time when a lot isn't and that's why it gets 6 stars. If you want Perry Mason, better invest in some old VHS or DVD's","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":17171,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-06-21","keywords":"character name as series title,perry mason character,two word series title,law firm,film noir style","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722629/","name":"Matthew Rhys","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1628115/","name":"Juliet Rylance","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1663252/","name":"Chris Chalk"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0306946/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3059930/","name":"Ron Fitzgerald","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1289754/","name":"Rolin Jones"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Watch Tonight, 9p EST on HBO","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1829092889","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTBhN2JhMzQtZTNlYy00YTI2LThjNTEtYTE1NmMwZDM2MjZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTBhN2JhMzQtZTNlYy00YTI2LThjNTEtYTE1NmMwZDM2MjZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"In booming 1932 Los Angeles, a down-and-out defense attorney takes on the case of a lifetime."</script><metacontent="

In booming 1932 Los Angeles, a down-and-out defense attorney takes on the case of a lifetime." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2077823/","name":"Perry Mason","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDllMWRjNWMtM2U3Ny00YjAwLTlhNTgtOThjZTc2YmI2ZmRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODkzNTgxMDg@._V1_.jpg","description":"In booming 1932 Los Angeles, a down-and-out defense attorney takes on the case of a lifetime.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2077823/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ztigr","dateCreated":"2020-08-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not a 1 star, but not a 10 either","reviewBody":"This series was a weird mish mash of 21st century culture clashing with 1930's reality. Alternative lifestyles, racism, politics, corruption, religious zealots, chauvanism, and uncertain economics all interwoven into a crime of the century murder trial. It all ends up sort of like Chinatown, with Perry Mason instead of the PI Jake utterly confused by what has just transpired. And that was my real question, is why Perry Mason. Why take something that most are familiar with and turn it upside down? There comes a point where your just using the name Perry Mason, and not much else. Its like taking Superman, taking away all his super powers, his cape, and making him a cop on the beat, but still calling him Superman. It doesn't make much sense. So its watchable at a time when a lot isn't and that's why it gets 6 stars. If you want Perry Mason, better invest in some old VHS or DVD's","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":17171,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-06-21","keywords":"character name as series title,perry mason character,two word series title,law firm,film noir style","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722629/","name":"Matthew Rhys","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1628115/","name":"Juliet Rylance","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1663252/","name":"Chris Chalk"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0306946/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3059930/","name":"Ron Fitzgerald","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1289754/","name":"Rolin Jones"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Watch Tonight, 9p EST on HBO","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1829092889","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTBhN2JhMzQtZTNlYy00YTI2LThjNTEtYTE1NmMwZDM2MjZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTBhN2JhMzQtZTNlYy00YTI2LThjNTEtYTE1NmMwZDM2MjZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"In booming 1932 Los Angeles, a down-and-out defense attorney takes on the case of a lifetime."</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1492179, Title: Strike Back, --- Description: Strike Back: With Philip Winchester, Sullivan Stapleton, Michelle Lukes, Daniel MacPherson. Follows the actions of Section 20, a secretive unit of British military intelligence. A team of special operations personnel conduct several high risk missions across the globe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1492179/","name":"Strike Back","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgyNDk4ZTYtM2EzNC00MmU3LTg2MmQtYjdlMjA4ZmEwNzU5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzU5Njg5MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the actions of Section 20, a secretive unit of British military intelligence. A team of special operations personnel conduct several high risk missions across the globe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1492179/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"colind888","dateCreated":"2017-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":""Struck Down"","reviewBody":"Whoever did the casting for Series 6 should be immediately taken out with an RPG. What were you thinking?? Replacing the god-like Philip Winchester, Sullivan Stapleton, Richard Armitage, Robson Green, Rhona Mitra and Andrew Lincoln with 3 midgets and a barbie doll all with dodgy accents. And to make matters worse, 20 is now being run by a timid girl from the BBC with a crush on Lord Grantham. You could not have got it more wrong if you had picked actors from the phone book.

I was really looking forward to the new season but so far The Brave is looking more polished and believable TV at every level. Totally disappointed!!

10 out of 10 for Series 1-4, 8 out of 10 for Series 5 and 5 out of 10 for this sad imitation.

Addendum: SE6E7 - unbelievable plot, unbelievable acting, unbelievable script, unbelievable romance, unbelievable decision making - just pathetic!! Lowering my rating on Season 6 to 3 stars and that is purely for the anthem "short change hero" which is all this debacle has left. Time to move on - RIP!!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":30473,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2010-05-05","keywords":"friendship,kidnapping,terrorism,revenge,obsession","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934618/","name":"Philip Winchester","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0822982/","name":"Sullivan Stapleton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1495675/","name":"Michelle Lukes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0208971/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042496/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050995/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi209365273","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcyOTg3MzY0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDA1NjgxMDE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcyOTg3MzY0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDA1NjgxMDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a teaser for the Cinemax limited series "Strike Back: Origins"."</script><metacontent="

What were you thinking?? Replacing the god-like Philip Winchester, Sullivan Stapleton, Richard Armitage, Robson Green, Rhona Mitra and Andrew Lincoln with 3 midgets and a barbie doll all with dodgy accents. And to make matters worse, 20 is now being run by a timid girl from the BBC with a crush on Lord Grantham. You could not have got it more wrong if you had picked actors from the phone book.

I was really looking forward to the new season but so far The Brave is looking more polished and believable TV at every level. Totally disappointed!!

10 out of 10 for Series 1-4, 8 out of 10 for Series 5 and 5 out of 10 for this sad imitation.

Addendum: SE6E7 - unbelievable plot, unbelievable acting, unbelievable script, unbelievable romance, unbelievable decision making - just pathetic!! Lowering my rating on Season 6 to 3 stars and that is purely for the anthem "short change hero" which is all this debacle has left. French vs. American social customs and behaviors are observed in a story about an American visiting her Frenchman-wed sister in Paris." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0306734/","name":"Le divorce","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxMjQ0MDgzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNjM1MDY2._V1_.jpg","description":"French vs. American social customs and behaviors are observed in a story about an American visiting her Frenchman-wed sister in Paris.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0306734/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"MLDinTN","dateCreated":"2004-08-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just another movie...","reviewBody":"you wonder why they ever spent money to make. It wasn't terrible, but not much happens. It didn't entertain me. Isabel goes to Paris to visit her pregnant sister, Roxanne. Upon arriving, she sees Roxanne's husband leaving her. So, she tries to cheer her sister up and has an affair with a married relative of the husband. He buys her an expensive purse and everyone knows they're hooking up. A side plot involves a painting that belongs to Roxanne's family. She doesn't want her husband to get it in the divorce. They decide to sell it and find out it's worth millions. So, now the 2 sisters have some money to start the new chapter in their lives.

I don't think it was a romance film and it sure wasn't funny. I would describe it as bland.

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"stonedonkies","dateCreated":"2005-08-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Raw, personal conflict was never so mesmerizing","reviewBody":"Six Feet Under is meticulous, beautiful, daunting, and powerful. One way or another, it will connect with you, perhaps in places you didn't expect and aren't willing to expose. At times wrenching, at other times cathartic, but always staring back at you knowingly, this show stands head and shoulders above the advertising-driven fare that clogs network TV with mediocrity, token minorities, and jarring commercial breaks. It changed the way I view television, and I recommend it to anyone who's tired of the same old crap.

After watching the series finale (which I won't spoil, don't worry), I sat in bed, unable to sleep. After poring over everything I'd seen over the past season, it struck me that SFU is the most raw and personal television show I've ever seen. Even more, there are no stand-alone episodes for easy syndication. Every single installment is part of a huge puzzle, or a few more miles on the Fisher family's road. I've always found Peter Krause to be a disappointingly flat performer, which is unfortunate because his character anchors the show, but the other actors are often transcendent. Regardless, every one of them radiates with a sometimes painfully familiar pathos. The cinematography is also staggering sometimes, taken from film rather than typical 3-camera TV work. If that's not enough, the music they choose to score the episodes is almost symbiotic; it seems ingrained into the film itself, even when you know it was just licensed.

This is not really a family-friendly show, though, encompassing profanity, nudity, violence, drug use, "alternative lifestyles" ... So in other words, it's just like real life. And despite the interpersonal conflicts that fuel the narrative to the point of melodrama, the show isn't afraid to pause every once in a while and let the show communicate without dialogue.

I feel very gratified to have watched SFU, and I've never felt that way about any other show in the almost-27 years I've been alive. Hopefully it will start a trend, if only on premium cable.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":127511,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. Hall","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0175814/","name":"Frances Conroy"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010714/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030266/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Six Feet Under: The Complete Second Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2609381657","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"stonedonkies","dateCreated":"2005-08-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Raw, personal conflict was never so mesmerizing","reviewBody":"Six Feet Under is meticulous, beautiful, daunting, and powerful. One way or another, it will connect with you, perhaps in places you didn't expect and aren't willing to expose. At times wrenching, at other times cathartic, but always staring back at you knowingly, this show stands head and shoulders above the advertising-driven fare that clogs network TV with mediocrity, token minorities, and jarring commercial breaks. It changed the way I view television, and I recommend it to anyone who's tired of the same old crap.

After watching the series finale (which I won't spoil, don't worry), I sat in bed, unable to sleep. After poring over everything I'd seen over the past season, it struck me that SFU is the most raw and personal television show I've ever seen. Even more, there are no stand-alone episodes for easy syndication. Every single installment is part of a huge puzzle, or a few more miles on the Fisher family's road. I've always found Peter Krause to be a disappointingly flat performer, which is unfortunate because his character anchors the show, but the other actors are often transcendent. Regardless, every one of them radiates with a sometimes painfully familiar pathos. The cinematography is also staggering sometimes, taken from film rather than typical 3-camera TV work. If that's not enough, the music they choose to score the episodes is almost symbiotic; it seems ingrained into the film itself, even when you know it was just licensed.

This is not really a family-friendly show, though, encompassing profanity, nudity, violence, drug use, "alternative lifestyles" ... So in other words, it's just like real life. And despite the interpersonal conflicts that fuel the narrative to the point of melodrama, the show isn't afraid to pause every once in a while and let the show communicate without dialogue.

I feel very gratified to have watched SFU, and I've never felt that way about any other show in the almost-27 years I've been alive. Hopefully it will start a trend, if only on premium cable.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":127511,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. Hall","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0175814/","name":"Frances Conroy"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010714/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030266/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Six Feet Under: The Complete Second Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2609381657","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Sniper: Assassin's End
Sniper: Assassin's End
programme.desc: Sniper: Assassin's End: Directed by Kaare Andrews. With Chad Michael Collins, Sayaka Akimoto, Tom Berenger, Ryan Robbins. Legendary sniper Thomas Beckett and his son, Special Ops Sniper Brandon Beckett, are on the run from the CIA, Russian Mercenaries, and a Yakuza-trained assassin with sniper skills that rival both legendary sharp shooters." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12305696/","name":"Sniper: Assassin's End","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNlNzBhNzMtNWNiOC00MGMxLWI3YjktNWMwNzJjMDEyZGQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzY1ODU1OTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Legendary sniper Thomas Beckett and his son, Special Ops Sniper Brandon Beckett, are on the run from the CIA, Russian Mercenaries, and a Yakuza-trained assassin with sniper skills that rival both legendary sharp shooters.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12305696/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shakercoola"},"dateCreated":"2021-10-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sassy spec-ops action","reviewBody":"An American action-thriller; The 8th film in the Sniper series. It follows two of the three recurring lead characters in the long running series: U. S. Marine Sgt Brandon Beckett, and Thomas Beckett, a former Mastery Gunnery Sgt of Force Reconnaissance Scout Snipers in United States Marine Corps. Set up as the primary suspect for the murder of a foreign dignitary and on the run from the CIA, Brandon Beckett takes on Russian mercenaries and a yakuza-trained assassin. This comic-book stylized sequel has some good action and impressive martial arts skills and a story that doesn't rely on knowledge of the past films. There is also good photography around marksmanship and concealment harking back to the original film. Although this has a run-of-the-mill plot and doesn't push any boundaries. Sayaka Akimoto gave the film some vitality and an interesting streak of colour.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1883,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-09-09","keywords":"sniper,narrow escape,special ops,trade agreement,blood splatter","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sniper: Assassin's End","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi87539225","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTE2MzAzMzUtZDJhNS00MWQ4LTgzOGUtNTkwYmM2NDg3MGUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTE2MzAzMzUtZDJhNS00MWQ4LTgzOGUtNTkwYmM2NDg3MGUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1792864/","name":"Chad Michael Collins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2687122/","name":"Sayaka Akimoto"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000297/","name":"Tom Berenger"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1543846/","name":"Kaare Andrews"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017834/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0137851/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3681509/","name":"Oliver Thompson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065847/","name":"Michael Frost Beckner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0508052/","name":"Crash Leyland"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 12305696, Title: Sniper: Assassin's End, --- Description: Sniper: Assassin's End: Directed by Kaare Andrews. With Chad Michael Collins, Sayaka Akimoto, Tom Berenger, Ryan Robbins. Legendary sniper Thomas Beckett and his son, Special Ops Sniper Brandon Beckett, are on the run from the CIA, Russian Mercenaries, and a Yakuza-trained assassin with sniper skills that rival both legendary sharp shooters." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12305696/","name":"Sniper: Assassin's End","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNlNzBhNzMtNWNiOC00MGMxLWI3YjktNWMwNzJjMDEyZGQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzY1ODU1OTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Legendary sniper Thomas Beckett and his son, Special Ops Sniper Brandon Beckett, are on the run from the CIA, Russian Mercenaries, and a Yakuza-trained assassin with sniper skills that rival both legendary sharp shooters.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12305696/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"shakercoola","dateCreated":"2021-10-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sassy spec-ops action","reviewBody":"An American action-thriller; The 8th film in the Sniper series. It follows two of the three recurring lead characters in the long running series: U. S. Marine Sgt Brandon Beckett, and Thomas Beckett, a former Mastery Gunnery Sgt of Force Reconnaissance Scout Snipers in United States Marine Corps. Set up as the primary suspect for the murder of a foreign dignitary and on the run from the CIA, Brandon Beckett takes on Russian mercenaries and a yakuza-trained assassin. This comic-book stylized sequel has some good action and impressive martial arts skills and a story that doesn't rely on knowledge of the past films. There is also good photography around marksmanship and concealment harking back to the original film. Although this has a run-of-the-mill plot and doesn't push any boundaries. Sayaka Akimoto gave the film some vitality and an interesting streak of colour.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1883,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-09-09","keywords":"sniper,narrow escape,special ops,trade agreement,blood splatter","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sniper: Assassin's End","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi87539225","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTE2MzAzMzUtZDJhNS00MWQ4LTgzOGUtNTkwYmM2NDg3MGUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTE2MzAzMzUtZDJhNS00MWQ4LTgzOGUtNTkwYmM2NDg3MGUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1792864/","name":"Chad Michael Collins","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2687122/","name":"Sayaka Akimoto","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000297/","name":"Tom Berenger"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1543846/","name":"Kaare Andrews"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017834/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0137851/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3681509/","name":"Oliver Thompson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065847/","name":"Michael Frost Beckner","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0508052/","name":"Crash Leyland"],"duration":"PT1H35M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Chaos Walking
Chaos Walking
programme.desc:
Chaos Walking: Directed by Doug Liman. With Tom Holland, Daisy Ridley, Demián Bichir, David Oyelowo. Two unlikely companions embark on a perilous adventure through the badlands of an unexplored planet as they try to escape a dangerous and disorienting reality where all thoughts are seen and heard by everyone." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2076822/","name":"Chaos Walking","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTcxYTk3MWQtZThlMS00ZjQ0LTg0NjktNGVkNWM2MTAyYWJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"Two unlikely companions embark on a perilous adventure through the badlands of an unexplored planet as they try to escape a dangerous and disorienting reality where all thoughts are seen and heard by everyone.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2076822/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jgreed-49807"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"In the same vein as maze runner/hunger games","reviewBody":"Never heard of story prior to watching the film, but as I watched it I thought this must be based on a book for young adults. And what do you know, it's based on a book for young adults. That being said the movie has an original plot, excluding Wonder Woman's island themiscara or whatever it's called, so that made for an interesting backdrop.

At its surface it's just an interesting plot, but more I think about it, for me it's kinda weird. I couldn't imagine a civilization behaving as the one on screen behaved, let alone conceiving such a plot. I think that's my biggest grip, but if you don't read to much into movie and just take it at it's face value, it might be entertaining.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":33734,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2021-03-05","keywords":"wilderness,based on young adult novel,mind reading,interplanetary,alien creature","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3486171417","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQwNWEzYWMtODAyYy00YjdmLTk3NzctZWQ2ZDJjMmQyOTExXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQwNWEzYWMtODAyYy00YjdmLTk3NzctZWQ2ZDJjMmQyOTExXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a dystopian colony on a planet called New World, Todd Hewitt (Tom Holland) has grown up believing a virus has killed all women and given all living creatures the ability to read each other’s minds and hear each other's thoughts in a stream of images, words and sounds called "the Noise."
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4043618/","name":"Tom Holland"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5397459/","name":"Daisy Ridley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065007/","name":"Demián Bichir"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510731/","name":"Doug Liman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070636/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0446409/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4710432/","name":"Patrick Ness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1755986/","name":"Christopher Ford"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen
White House Down
programme.desc:
Olympus Has Fallen: Directed by Antoine Fuqua. With Gerard Butler, Aaron Eckhart, Finley Jacobsen, Dylan McDermott. Secret Service agent Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack and works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2302755/","name":"Olympus Has Fallen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU0NmY4MWYtNzRlMS00MDkxLWJkODYtOTM3NGI2ZDc1NTJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Secret Service agent Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack and works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2302755/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"AvidClimber"},"dateCreated":"2013-04-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Olympus Has Fallen — America is under attack, to hell with logic","reviewBody":"Olympus Has Fallen is yet an other US president oriented flick. A ton of action and special effects with almost as many logical flaws.

The acting is good, particularly Morgan Freeman (to a lesser extent: Gerard Butler and Aaron Eckhart) and there's no denying the roller coaster ride, but it has many shortcomings. Aside from the usual suspension of disbelief, logic fails at almost every turn. Then there's the poor dialogs, the easy retorts, the one dimensional underdeveloped characters, the incredible body count, and the overly flag-centric pride.

It's action based entertainment for sure, but not much else.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":266381,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2013-03-22","keywords":"politics,political thriller,u.s. president,political assassination,white house","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Exclusive Debut","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3461588761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2NDc5NzgyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODc0MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2NDc5NzgyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODc0MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Disgraced former Presidential guard Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack; using his inside knowledge, Banning works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124930/","name":"Gerard Butler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001173/","name":"Aaron Eckhart"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000151/","name":"Morgan Freeman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0298807/","name":"Antoine Fuqua"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0332840/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4950667/","name":"Creighton Rothenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4951717/","name":"Katrin Benedikt"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The November Man
The November Man
programme.desc:
The November Man: Directed by Roger Donaldson. With Pierce Brosnan, Luke Bracey, Olga Kurylenko, Bill Smitrovich. An ex-C.I.A. operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level C.I.A. officials and the Russian President-elect." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2402157/","name":"The November Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTkzMDk5NjUxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzMwOTMyMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-C.I.A. operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level C.I.A. officials and the Russian President-elect.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2402157/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Hellmant"},"dateCreated":"2014-09-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"I'd say it's better than about half of the James Bond movies.","reviewBody":"'THE November MAN': Three and a Half Stars (Out of Five)

Spy thriller starring Pierce Brosnan as an ex-CIA agent who must take on an old pupil, when his former employers kill the woman he loves and target him for assassination. The movie was directed by Roger Donaldson; who's directed such popular hits as 'COCTAIL', 'CADILLAC MAN', 'THE BOUNTY', 'SPECIES' and 'DANTE'S PEAK' (which also stars Brosnan). It was written by Michael Finch and Karl Gajdusek and based on the book 'There Are No Spies' (which is the seventh installment in 'The November Man' series) by Bill Granger. It costars Luke Bracey, Olga Kurylenko, Bill Smitrovich and Will Patton. I found it to be pretty entertaining and surprisingly dark, and violent, but still nothing too new or interesting to offer fans of the genre.

Brosnan plays Peter Devereaux; an ex-CIA agent who retired after a student of his, David Mason (Bracey), accidentally killed a kid (while the two were doing an assignment together in Montenegro). Since that time Peter has started a relationship with another CIA operative, named Natalia Ulanova (Mediha Musilovic). He comes out of retirement to aid her on a deep cover assignment in Russia, when she's murdered by Mason; under the orders of CIA chief Perry Weinstein (Patton). Peter then wants revenge on the CIA, for killing Natalia, and will stop at nothing to find out what vital information she uncovered and why she was killed for it.

The story is that of a pretty routine espionage thriller but it does take some pretty dark turns, here and there. Both Brosnan and Bracey's characters do some pretty questionable 'anti-heroic' things that, at times, leave the viewer questioning who they're supposed to root for. So in that way I really enjoyed the movie. Brosnan does slip back into the ultimate spy role with plenty of ease and Donaldson does a pretty effective job delivering the action. Kurylenko looks stunning as usual (and even uncannily resembles a young Catherine Zeta-Jones in some scenes). The film might not have much original to offer, fans of the genre, but it's still a lot of fun; I'd even say it's better than about half of the James Bond movies.

programme.title: Straw Dogs
Straw Dogs – Wer Gewalt sät
programme.desc:
Straw Dogs: Directed by Rod Lurie. With James Marsden, Kate Bosworth, Alexander Skarsgård, James Woods. Los Angeles screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0999913/","name":"Straw Dogs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzQ1MTk5ODIzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzU1MzgyMjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Los Angeles screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0999913/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2013-03-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Inferior but exciting remake about a writer and his wife are threatened by hooligans locals","reviewBody":"Modern remake from Sam Peckinpah's 1971 controversial shocker in which Dustin Hoffman, who starred in , and famously disliked, the original film, gave filmmaker Rod Lurie his blessing . Released i almost 40 years to the day of the original 1971 version, which came out November 3 1971 . It deals with L.A. screen writer David Sumner (James Marsden) relocates with his wife (Kate Bosworth) to her hometown in the deep South. When they return to her ancestral village tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals (Rhys Coiro, Billy Lush and led by Alexander Skarsgård as Charlie) becomes a threat to them both. Meanwhile David is working on a story about Stalingrad (the book is early in the movie is 'Stalingrad' by Anthony Beevor). There her former boyfriends become resentful , jealous and desirous of her , as she taunts them with her wealth and nudism and she is viciously attacked . As the marriage is bullied and taken advantage of by the locals (in original rendition were played by Ken Hutchinson, David Warner , Peter Vaughan , Del Henney) hired to do construction. When David finally takes a stand it escalates quickly into a bloody battle as the locals assault his house . David whose pacifism is put to supreme test attempts to protect a dim-witted man (Dominic Purcell) who is suspected of disappearance and molesting a young girl (Willa Holland) , his house is put under siege by the incensed villagers , but David defends the mansion with ferocity .

New but inferior version version about one of the most controversial violence-themed pictures of its day ; dealing with a known plot , as a young American and his wife come to rural little town and face increasingly vicious local harassment. The film, a remake of the controversially violent 1971 movie, is considered fairly faithful to Sam Peckinpah's original, though the location has been moved from Cornwall, England to the U.S. Mississippi Gulf Coast, and the hero's profession has been changed from an intellectual mathematician to screenwriter . The title comes from the Chinese philosopher Lao-tzu, who wrote, "Heaven and earth are not humane, and regard the people as straw dogs, " Straw dogs were used as ceremonial objects for religious sacrifices in ancient China. The picture is as violent as the first version , in fact, because of its graphic portrayal of violence and two brutal rapes, the British Board of Film Censors banned the film from being released on video from 1984 until 2002. The highly charged sequences of carnage in the conclusion make this a controversial movie similarly to original picture .

The motion picture was professionally directed by Rod Lurie though with no originally , resulting to be a simple copy from Peckinpah flick , being equally based on the novel "The Siege of Trencher's Farm" by Gordon Williams , including screenplay by David Goodman and the same Peckinpah. Rod is a talented film critic-turned-director who burst onto the scene in late 2000 with his hotly debated political thriller ¨The contender¨. After writing some scripts , Lurie was already hard at work at his next film, working with his acting hero Robert Redford. The result was the 2001 action/drama ¨The last castle ¨ (2001). It centered on an imprisoned military general, forced to go up against a tyrannical prison warden . He subsequently directed ¨Resurrecting the champ¨ and ¨Nothing but the truth¨, both of them were commercial failures despite some favorable reviews as well as ¨Straw Dogs¨.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":33727,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-09-16","keywords":"rape,sexual humiliation,rape victim,gang rape,panties pulled down","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi174103833","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNzU4MDI4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI5MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNzU4MDI4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI5MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"L.A. screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005188/","name":"James Marsden"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0098378/","name":"Kate Bosworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002907/","name":"Alexander Skarsgård"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527109/","name":"Rod Lurie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0089304/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527109/","name":"Rod Lurie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0329051/","name":"David Zelag Goodman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001603/","name":"Sam Peckinpah"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Chaos Walking
Chaos Walking
programme.desc:
Chaos Walking: Directed by Doug Liman. With Tom Holland, Daisy Ridley, Demián Bichir, David Oyelowo. Two unlikely companions embark on a perilous adventure through the badlands of an unexplored planet as they try to escape a dangerous and disorienting reality where all thoughts are seen and heard by everyone." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2076822/","name":"Chaos Walking","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTcxYTk3MWQtZThlMS00ZjQ0LTg0NjktNGVkNWM2MTAyYWJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"Two unlikely companions embark on a perilous adventure through the badlands of an unexplored planet as they try to escape a dangerous and disorienting reality where all thoughts are seen and heard by everyone.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2076822/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jgreed-49807"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"In the same vein as maze runner/hunger games","reviewBody":"Never heard of story prior to watching the film, but as I watched it I thought this must be based on a book for young adults. And what do you know, it's based on a book for young adults. That being said the movie has an original plot, excluding Wonder Woman's island themiscara or whatever it's called, so that made for an interesting backdrop.

At its surface it's just an interesting plot, but more I think about it, for me it's kinda weird. I couldn't imagine a civilization behaving as the one on screen behaved, let alone conceiving such a plot. I think that's my biggest grip, but if you don't read to much into movie and just take it at it's face value, it might be entertaining.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":33734,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2021-03-05","keywords":"wilderness,based on young adult novel,mind reading,interplanetary,alien creature","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3486171417","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQwNWEzYWMtODAyYy00YjdmLTk3NzctZWQ2ZDJjMmQyOTExXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQwNWEzYWMtODAyYy00YjdmLTk3NzctZWQ2ZDJjMmQyOTExXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a dystopian colony on a planet called New World, Todd Hewitt (Tom Holland) has grown up believing a virus has killed all women and given all living creatures the ability to read each other’s minds and hear each other's thoughts in a stream of images, words and sounds called "the Noise."
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4043618/","name":"Tom Holland"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5397459/","name":"Daisy Ridley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065007/","name":"Demián Bichir"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510731/","name":"Doug Liman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070636/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0446409/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4710432/","name":"Patrick Ness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1755986/","name":"Christopher Ford"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="
